name: Parking Swipe
description:
We have all been there – stuck in a parking jam at a parking lot and no matter how many times you go back and forth, you are still jammed! Don’t let that happen on your phone. With Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam, you have full control over the parking jam. Use your brain and logical thinking to decide how to unblock the parking lot. Figure out which car needs to move first and in which direction to unblock other cars.

With amazing 3D graphics and hundreds of parking jam levels, Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam will surely keep you entertained for hours. Even if you bump into a car or two while trying to ‘unjam’ the jam, that’s no reason for concern in this car parking game unless you are playing a challenge where every move counts. Literally.

Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam features:

- Unbelievably realistic experience of a traffic jam in fantastic 3D graphics.

- Relaxing and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master this traffic puzzle

- Hundreds of levels: tons of fun, featuring unique bonuses and explosive combinations

- Super additive car traffic puzzle free games you can even play offline: no Wi-Fi or internet connection required

Maybe you can’t beat a crowded parking lot in real life, but in Parking Swipe - 3D Cars Puzzle Jam game, miracles happen even if it takes a few bumps along the way. Set them all free and send them on their way.

Will you be the traffic puzzle genius to rescue the traffic jam? Beat the traffic, destroy traffic, whatever you call it, let's be traffic king!

Ready? Unblock the car parking lot and escape!
